Comments_List: I got better at reading and discussing psych and OB papers, as well as explaining concepts from social psych to unfamiliar folks. I also improved my ability to pull key points out of different papers and to ask questions to connect themes from different works.

The main strength of this course is Michael and Amy, who are amazing instructors and fostered a super open, thoughtful space of discussion. The format is exactly right, and the readings are almost all interesting. The one thing that could help students is looking a little more carefully at the amount of reading week to week, and maybe trying to reduce the page count a little bit the last couple weeks of the semester, when people are pretty swamped in other assignments.

Absolutely would recommend! I loved this course so much. It's helped expand my knowledge and interest in different areas of social psych/OB, and improved my confidence and ability in group discussion. It also created a great student community around the material.
